data.name: Johnny Lionface
data.detailed_description:
Story
Johnny is the ultimate fighter, destined for greatness--at least he thinks so. After getting rejected from the Gladiators' Guild tryouts once again, he sets off on an adventure to become the gladiator he knows he can be. Along the way he'll team up with a shotgun-toting schizoid mouse, a dancing kung-fu cat, and other colorful combatants.



Features
  • 12 total playable characters, from man-eating ghosts to killer robots to clerics
  • No teammate left behind! The party levels up as one and shares the same equipment levels. Haven't used a character in a while? No problem!
  • "Friendly Mode", an alternate script that replaces all the spicy stuff for a friendlier experience.
  • Modesty settings let you choose between nudity and skimpy outfits or more modest, junk-covering designs for enemies and outfits.
  • Three difficulty settings that affect enemy resistances and the effects of their abilities.
  • 200+ abilities to master. Each character can have 8 abilities equipped at a time and many have 15+ to choose from
  • 150+ runes (equipment modifiers). Each character can have up to 9 runes equipped at a time
  • Save builds and share them with your friends
  • In-game bestiary gives you the scoop on dozens of enemies and bosses

Story

data.short_description: A twisted story-driven action-RPG with endless ways to build your party of colorful combatants.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence and crude, sexual humor, bad language. There is a safe mode though that players can use to enable a family-friendly experience.
